article: signaling the breakup of the anti-syrian coalition , christian leader michel aoun announced tuesday he will field his own candidates in upcoming parliamentary elections and lashed out at his muslim opposition allies for helping syria dominate lebanon in the past decades .
abstract: christian opposition leader splits with muslims ahead of crucial elections
